short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Nature Scenery wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Nature Scenery background. Nature Scenery wallpaper theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features of the Extension:

1. Experience a new Nature Scenery wallpaper every time you open a tab.
2. Choose a random Nature Scenery theme or select your favorite in the wallpaper picker.
3. Utilize the Google-powered search bar.
4. Direct links to email and social networks for fast access.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. Create new notes to keep track of your tasks.
7. Shortcut to frequently visited sites for swift navigation.
8. Streamlined bookmarking for easier access.
9. Quick add feature for websites in the Shortcut panel.
10. Instant entry to Google's suite of apps.
11. Immediate access to additional themes.
12. Share content effortlessly on social media.
13.  Quick access to Download wallpaper.
14. Quick access to play games.
15. Activate entertaining animations like snow, rain, leaves, and fireworks in your Nature Scenery tab.
